segments.text: I see this woman in the kitchen, just standing there drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her back to the sink, completely focused on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the faucet, overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge, making a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in it, but she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, there's a boy climbing on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, looking so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing next to him, holding her hand out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both ignoring the mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks so peaceful and nice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's crazy how calm everything outside is compared to this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
